name: WASH AND GLASSING
description: Deep Cleaning with high speed jet water Gun. Softner and polishing materials are used to clean and shine your car as like as new.

name: COMPLETE ANALYSIS
description: Fully automated machine is used to figure out all the possible problems inside and outside of engine. Also experienced personeels are assigned to fix the diagnosed problem.

name: ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC
description: This service is mainly focused on engine performance. A very intelligent system is examined the sound and other parameter of the engine and give skilled personeel direction about faults. Highly Skilled and experienced technician fix them out.

name: WHEEL ALIGNMENT
description: Wheel alignment is very very importan for your car. It can lead to accident. We offer a yearly package also for routine wheel alignment checkup. If you interested, Please contact to our office.

name: OIL CHANGING
description: Oil Changing is routine & imporyant work for your car which may lead to shorten engine life. We offer a yearly package also for routine Oil changing. If you interested, Please contact to our office.

name: BRAKE REPAIRING
description: Apart from repairing your car brakes we offer you a package that includes changing brake shoes with original one as well as other braking problem to fix. For more information, Please contact to our office.
